title: Le Pont du Nord = North Bridge
description: Marie, a former terrorist, is fresh out of prison. She hopes to link up again with her former life. She contacts Julien, her former boyfriend, who does not seem too happy to see her again. When Julien mysteriously disappears, Marie goes looking for him. Here starts a surreal walk through the streets of Paris with a street map that looks like a board game and which Marie meets a dreamy homeless man, a small-time crook and destiny.  Credits: Producers, Barbet Schroeder, Jean-Pierre Mahot  ; director, Jacques Rivette ; writers, Jerome Prieur, Bulle Ogier, Pascale Ogier, Jacques Rivette, Suzanne Schiffman ; photography, William Lubtchansky, Caroline Champetier ; music, Astor Piazzo Cast: Bulle Ogier, Pascale Ogier, Pierre Clementi, Jean-Francois Stevenin, Benjamin Baltimore.
